sentences.en: ‘What did you say?’ ‘Oh, nothing important.’
sentences.cn: “你说什么？”“噢，没什么大事。”

sentences.en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
sentences.cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

sentences.en: a very important customer
sentences.cn: 一位大客户

sentences.en: a very important meeting
sentences.cn: 很重要的会议

sentences.en: Diet and relaxation are two important keys to good health.
sentences.cn: 限制饮食和放松身心是保持健康的两个要诀。

sentences.en: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important and so is bran.
sentences.cn: 新鲜的水果和蔬菜很重要，麦麸也是。

sentences.en: Happiness is more important than money.
sentences.cn: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.en: He dressed very smartly which was important in those days.
sentences.cn: 他衣冠楚楚——这一点在那个时候很重要。

sentences.en: I am expecting several important letters but nothing has arrived.
sentences.cn: 我正在等几封重要的信件，可是一封都没到。

sentences.en: It is always important to choose enjoyable, nutritious foods.
sentences.cn: 选择好吃的、营养价值高的食物总是很重要。

sentences.en: It is important that we dovetail our respective interests.
sentences.cn: 让我们各自的利益相吻合很重要。

sentences.en: It was gratifying to be in the know about important people.
sentences.cn: 了解重要人物的一些内幕真令人高兴。

sentences.en: It’s vitally important that you understand the danger.
sentences.cn: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.en: Lesley's career in the church is vitally important to her.
sentences.cn: 莱斯莉在教堂的工作经历对她来说至关重要。

sentences.en: Lumbar support is very important if you're driving a long way.
sentences.cn: 长途驾驶时，腰部的支撑十分重要。

sentences.en: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.cn: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.en: The intellect is not the most important thing in life.
sentences.cn: 才智不是生活中最重要的东西。

sentences.en: The Oxford Chemistry Primers aim to cover important topics in organic chemistry.
sentences.cn: 《牛津化学初级读本》丛书旨在论述有机化学中的重要问题。

sentences.en: These days work plays an important part in a single woman's life.
sentences.cn: 现在，工作在单身女性的生活中起着重要作用。

sentences.en: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!
sentences.cn: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentences.en: Zip drives help people to organise their important information.
sentences.cn: 压缩磁盘驱动器有助于人们管理重要信息。

words.tran_cn: 重要地；大量地；有名望地；自命不凡地
进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性

phrases.tran_cn: 非常重要的；极为重要的
最重要的；首要的；最关键的

trans.tran_en: an important event, decision, problem etc has a big effect or influence on people’s lives or on events in the future
